website_summaries.verdict: Smartly designed top mount pool sand filter that works for almost any kind of pool, as well as ponds.
pros: Easier to install than some other sand filters with a 360-degree flange clamp
Sand filter tank won't corrode, thanks to the construction materials
Can be cleaned quickly because of the large drain
Works with above-ground and in-ground pools, as well as ponds or aquariums
cons: Higher price point than some other pump options

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with guarantee from Prime and seller
customer_reviews.text: I'm an installer who purchases sand filters often for the last 20 years installed hundreds it is very rare for a split tank however this seller seems to be having many including the one I have
customer_reviews.author: La White

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Tank Split again - I am addicted to them
customer_reviews.text: 3rd tank in 5 years. Always splits after 1 year warranty runs out. I keep replacing with the same model to avoid re-plumbing. Classic definition of Insanity - repeat same actions expecting a different result. I am truly certifiable because I will probably purchase again to avoid the extra plumbing work. Even if they ever honor a warranty it will need to be installed by a "pro hence you will pay the cost of a new tank anyway. These tanks are like cigarettes, once you start you can't stop.!!!! Do not be like me!
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: Minus one point for not including the fittings, but very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Minus one point for not including the fittings. (look for the ' Hayward SPX1091Z2 Hose Male Insert Adapter Replacement' - which implies you are 'replacing' something) After 15 or so years our DoughBoy fabric panel filter, annual tear-down, removing/washing/replacing panels, it finally quit pushing the water through. At 1/3 the cost, we gave this a try. YES! Used the apparently warranty voiding ZeoSand (100 pounds vs the recommended 200 pounds of pool sand) with much success! (Northern climate here- so I have to bring this beast inside during the winter- wet/dry vacuum 100vs200 pounds of sand?)
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Never buy filter cartridges again! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great filter for my 12' x 18' oval above ground pool. Its actually larger than what I really need but the last Hayward I bought lasted 5 years and so did the sand. My pool runs all year long here in Miami so it never gets winterized or stops working. These filters are great because there is no need to change filter cartridges. Just back wash once a month during summer and once every 2-3 months during winter months. This whole process takes less than 5 minutes and you're done. What really helps TREMENDOUSLY is using a skimmer sock. My pool stays crystal clear all year long using the skimmer sock.
customer_reviews.author: inspector gadget 007

customer_reviews.title: Filter leaks at the seam
customer_reviews.text: This filter is a piece of junk. I had my old filter for over 20 years and this one I have only had 2 years and it is leaking at the seam. Obviously it was not made properly. Customer service keeps you on hold forever and they don't answer. Buyers beware. This product is no longer made very well at all. Very disappointed. If I could give 0 Stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: something wrong with the valve top to the tank
customer_reviews.text: needed to replace cracked Hayward tank. This came with the complete tank with the valve piece top mount, which was totally defective. It produced sand coming from the filter and making the pool water milky and depositing sand on pool floor. the Backwash did not work, and for some reason, the designated spots on valve piece did not respond to category. Had to replace the top. a little pissed off about that seeing as I paid a few hundred $$ for this
customer_reviews.author: FranieB

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This sand filter was used a total of 4 months in 2018 and 1 month in 2019. Two days ago it started leaking from the seam which is not repairable. Only a 1 yr warrant, we had it 1yr and a month which made it out of warranty. Not a good product. We wondered why one locally was more but obviously it it made better and actually has a 5yr warranty! Now we have spent another $365 plus tax. Don't go with the deals, they are made cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Tran

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product Once Again!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd replacement pump in 4 years that was purchased from Hayward. The 1st lasted 3 of those years and I was certain that I might have gotten a LEMON, because there was an on going leak in the seam of the outside tub. However, the 2nd one did NOT even make it through the entire summer and the EXACT problem happened with leak in the seam. I reached out to the seller and of course refund or return was no longer available so NOTHING will be resolved and we are out $300.00 plus dollars for another defective product by HAYWARD.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Should've Bought this YEARS Ago!
customer_reviews.text: Our old filter was only rated for 50 pounds of sand. I have about 150 pounds in this for a 14 foot diameter pool and we have not had any of the old problems we've had for years. We've saved on chemicals because the sand filter works so well! It's also sized better for our larger pump. Well worth the money and time to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Griffith

customer_reviews.title: 2 and a half years of awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, but 2-1/2 years later it is cracking at the seam near the top. My pressure jumps up to about 18psi when in need of backwashing so it's not like I have run too much pressure. It's just a defective unit that is out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I have only been using this for a month and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this for a month and it is fall. So far it has done a fair job. I will know more when spring rolls around and the water tries to cloud up. I changed from a DE filter; not sure this will keep the water as clear. Also the return and inlet connections are really close at the head of the unit but have not cause any problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: William Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Split seam.  Hayward replacing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this May 2019. Used 3 months then stored for winter. Used 2 months this season and the seam near the top has split. Have emailed Hayward 3 times and only received automated reply. 12 month warranty and it split at 14 months. Been a pool owner 27 years. First filter lasted 28 years 2nd lasted 8 years and this one 24 months with only 5 months of actual use. Hayward is replacing the tank at no charge. Thank you Hayward
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performs well
customer_reviews.text: I had this filter before and they have a problem with the seam on the tank wearing through. That being said, these really do a good job filtering AND Hayward is responsive to this issue and sent me a replacement sand tank.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K. Nowlan

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for a better deal!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit leery ordering from Amazon warehouse, but this arrived, in perfect condition, brand new, exactly what we needed. Took all the plumbing skills we didn't have to hook everything up, but it's working beautifully. And the price was the best prices anywhere on the web. THANK YOU AMAZON! This saved us a ton of money!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 10,000 gal pool
customer_reviews.text: I had an older sand filter that was giving me issues eventually I had it and ordered this one, set up was a breeze let it run over night and there is a considerable difference in the pool. Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Pinhole leak at seam in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these units in operation and one of them developed a pinhole leak in just under 5 months from installation. Leak is directly on the fused seam of the unit. These filters are actually used indoors on aquariums so weather conditions, over pressurization, or media compaction are not the issue. The issue is quality control. I will not buy another Hayward sand filter again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sand fliter
customer_reviews.text: This us the best thing I bought for my pool so easy to use I'm so glad I bought it No mess like the DE fliter Sand fliter much better don't have to dump DE in the pool skimmer. Love this worth it cost less
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of tank seams.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality. Filter only lasted just over 3 years. Seam cracked at the tank neck where the valve assembly mounts. I hope Hayward addresses the on going problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A.

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The warranty is for one year only and now (after 20 months) the filter is cracked and needs to be replaced. Should have stayed with the Jacuzzi filter, which has a 5-year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: GarMar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Good buy, but the last one from Hayward I will buy. The last two have a split at the neck which make them unrepairable, very frustrating to have this happen.
customer_reviews.author: David Allen

customer_reviews.title: Was very easy to attach to my pool and really worked great
customer_reviews.text: My old pump stopped working this year, so we went and got this pump. Was very easy to attach to my pool and really worked great. I really like this pump and am very happy I decided to go with a Hayward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to do!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up. Instructions were clear enough for me to understand. Came with everything I needed except the hoses to go from pump to filter and filter back to pool. Easy set up! Worked perfect right off the bat and is still rocking and rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got my filter the next day. Fast great service
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy set up. I used for above ground pool. But the best thing is I got my filter the next day. I was having company for weekend holiday and wanted the filter fast and I got it 3 days early. They shipped it out promptly so thank you my pool is now ready for holiday fun. I would order from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We were having issues with our old filter. Due to the age of our old one and the parts that would need to be purchased, we purchased this new one. Set up was easy and it had the pool sparkling by the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Factory defect
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years the filter spilt at the seam just like other reviewers said. I contacted hayward and after sending a copy of the receipt and a picture of the defect, they sent me a new filter free of charge. It is a good filter that keeps my pool very clean. It just took a while to get the replacement but hopefully they have fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE THIN SPOT ON THE SEAM
customer_reviews.text: Leaks at the seam after only 3 months . THEY ALL HAVE A THIN DEFECTIVE SPOT!!!Hayward doesn't want to warranty. I'm still trying though
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: worth the money !!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a 100lb sand filter to this 200lb filter & I would advise everybody to do that, it truly filters a whole lot better ! you can easily see the results when you back-flush let alone the clearer pool water
customer_reviews.author: Shurshottom

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing an old filter with this one. It is just as described and it was easy for my husband to install. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: dekell

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal Great price Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: This filter made a great replacement for my old 16" hayward that I let freeze last winter (didnt' take the valve off and didnt' put it in winter position) when all the water didn't drain from it even though the plug was out all winter. The base was included and it even had an add on section for a pump but it didnt' fit for the pump I had (not sure what would). In any case, the round base is included contrary to what another guy said on here. Other than that, installation was a breeze and I was up and filtering in no time. Good value and good filter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again but hope it lasts 40 years as my previous Hayward filter lasted
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 2 days in original box from Hayward. Very easy to install even with unit being 3" taller than same size in volume as my 40 year old Hayward sand filter.
customer_reviews.author: Granny1518

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful filter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June to replace a doughboy pump that finally gave up working. We have ours paired with a 1.5hp Harris pump and it works great! You need a cap for the backwash opening and two fittings for the lines (we spent $11 total at our local pool supply for all 3 pieces).
customer_reviews.author: jspring

customer_reviews.title: Can hardly beat the cost benefit ratio
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly. It's bigger than I'd expected, larger than my current filter. The current filter cracked on the side after years of use and had to be discarded. Our pool guy couldn't believe what we had paid for it (only $100). To be fair we were closing the pool so I didn't get to test it yet. Updates to come.
customer_reviews.author: AfricanibalTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Super saving
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I am very satisfied with my purchase. I did a little research and found that most local retail pool supply places wanted well over $300 for a similar though not necessarily equal quality product and I was able to purchase this filter for significantly less. I will say that my purchase was not without any hitch, the first filter was delivered without the head or other listed pieces (basically I got the barrel and base) but Amazon quickly sent me a replacement however the pressure gauge was never functioning. Aside from these issues this filter works fantastic and is much improved over my older original Hayward sand filter.
customer_reviews.author: DEP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Directions look easy and I have owned one just like this previously, it will be perfect for this pool season!
customer_reviews.author: skmister

customer_reviews.title: Quality Filter
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for a year now and am happy to say it has worked as expected. We replaced the previous filter when we started having problems with sand in the pool and some other issues. It arrived quickly and was carefully packaged. Make sure you are ordering the proper size for your pool.
customer_reviews.author: sunmom2

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded to this pump and it has been working perfectly!! We have a cleaner, clearer pool because of this pump and filter. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: musicj

customer_reviews.title: ... crystal clear hoping it will last along time was recommended by the guy that does my pool repairs to ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made it's keeping my pool crystal clear hoping it will last along time was recommended by the guy that does my pool repairs to replace old filter that developed a leak seems to be a much better design the my old filter
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Not real sure if its the filter design or defect ...
customer_reviews.text: Not real sure if its the filter design or defect. When I put it on close some water still comes out of the waste/drain line, but not when I have it on filter. Might just be an adjustment that needs to be done in the head.
customer_reviews.author: Twyla LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Don't send it back
customer_reviews.text: The filter is a Hayward so it is good, however I had to return it since it was too large for my pool. Costed 200 to ship it back and they charged a 20% restock fee. Ended up losing money and Amazon did not refund any shipping. Rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Elberfeld

customer_reviews.title: My pool is Crystal clear and blue!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was able to install it with minimal cussing. And it works great with the right chemicals in the pool. I recommend this filter without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Marton

customer_reviews.title: The right filter for the job.
customer_reviews.text: Item works as it should, I use silica sand I got from building supply company for $12.00 which is working perfect (100 lb bag) It is .36 and teh company would like you to use .45-.55 but the stuff i got is working as i said perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Quayle

customer_reviews.title: Filter
customer_reviews.text: Best filter I have owned. 1 1/2 days to arrive here. Best deal yet.TY
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: got a fantastic deal on it and as you can imagine the product name it works good no issues or problems went together just as it should

customer_reviews.title: This one does a great job. You do need to really tighten the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this filter to replace my old Hayward S2000 side mount sand filter. This one does a great job. You do need to really tighten the bolts that hold the head on or they leak. But my pool is crystal clear and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great pool filter
customer_reviews.text: After one seasons use have no complaints. Replaced an older version of the same filter that cracked along the top due to age / UV exposure. Compared to that old one the base is better and the valve set up much improved, with a winter setting option to try to prevent cracking. I move mine to the shed in winter to reduce weathering so need to plug the holes to keep the mice out, but no complaints. Does a great job on my 18X36 AG pool.
customer_reviews.author: FranTheMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Filter!
customer_reviews.text: A lot better filter than the old Intex filter. Better filtering, less back-pressure, easier-to-use selector valve and more settings. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Syslo

customer_reviews.title: YES IT WILL WORK FOR THAT... BUT...
customer_reviews.text: 20+ Year Service Tech Here... YES IT WILL WORK... It does a fine job with even an 18 by 32 inground pool... PROVIDED YOU HAVE NO TREES OR SHRUBS AND YOU BACKWASH. You are welcome.
customer_reviews.author: bricmpt

customer_reviews.title: Seam cracked after 18 months!! Cheaply made!!
customer_reviews.text: Product only last 18 months. Seam cracked where this thing is molded together and leaked like crazy. Warranty is only good for 1 year. There went $180 out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good Sand Filter
customer_reviews.text: We have had the filter for 1.5 months and so far so good. We added the 200 lbs of sand per directions. The only problem we have had is occassionally the system will slow down. I'm not sure if it's too much sand or our pump.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up. Just disconnected prior hoses and reconnected hoses after filling with media.
customer_reviews.author: AmyBob

customer_reviews.title: Bought this Filter end of the season in Sept 2014 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Filter end of the season in Sept 2014. This is the middle of summer 2018 and the tank is leaking at the seams. Going to have to replace it. The first filter we had lasted for 30 yrs. since we only use it in the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Bought to replace my 24 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Bought to replace my 24 year old S180T tank.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Tank leaks at seam near the top..3 years old. Seams they have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Spiderman

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product was bigger than I had expected when it arrived. We’ve had it installed on our 22ft pool for a coup,e of weeks now and it’s working great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Sand filter
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it was similar to the one that it was replacing
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Great filter at a great price. Easy to assemble and keeps the pool clean. Able to handle a 1.5 HP pump without a problem. Circulation of total water capacity is great.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Installed and used all summer after my old sand filter failed. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Filter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement that is just finishing it's 2nd season. Im very happy with this filter
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: After 13mo filter housing cracked at seam where ID tag ...
customer_reviews.text: After 13mo filter housing cracked at seam where ID tag is, obviously a flaw in manufacturing. No response from Hayward on warranty/replacement. Do consider this on your purchase of this product. Update: (5) business days later and 90 minutes on hold, still no human being. Their customer support is very poor, so I lowered my review to (1) star.
customer_reviews.author: USMC_Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these units to replace 1 broken doughboy filter. I pipe them in parallel, added a Intex saltwater system, and also added 2 additional returns. I used the same recirculation pump but the increased flow has allowed me to cut my pump run time in half. Great product! Several of my neighbors are wanting there pools changed over. (The cost of both of these was only $20 above the single doughboy unit). Buy your pool filter sand at Home Depot!
customer_reviews.author: CR Bard

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement and saved $120 over local store.
customer_reviews.text: An exact replacement for my old (12 years) filter. Assembled easily and works great. Buying this saved me $120 because the local pool store wanted that much more for the SAME THING! Save yourself some money and time- it's an easy job to replace.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteIsland

customer_reviews.title: Read  the directions
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to connect and fill up. It’s worklng wonderfully too. Be sure to read the directions in full before you start. I also watched a how to video.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Elmowitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice filter, works well on my 18x33 oval pool.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice filter. The o ring and clamo system used where the filter head meets the tank is far superior to the screw-on types for serviceability. Another detail I really like is the larger ergonomic knob plug for the tank drain instead of the normal small pipe plug. The tank is a nice solid plastic, not a fiberglass that will flake off, and it comes with a pressure gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Nichols

customer_reviews.title: The difference is amazing. I have a 22" oval pool and the ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Hayward to replace a cracked doughboy that had seen 10+ years of service. I didn't realize my old filter was too small until we installed this one. The difference is amazing. I have a 22" oval pool and the water moves even in the far end. Installation was easy. It does not come with the hose adapters.
customer_reviews.author: green-t

customer_reviews.title: Good design and well made
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, especially the separate base. That made it easier to position it where i wanted it and to adjust where the drain was in relation to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Marc R.

customer_reviews.title: One year
customer_reviews.text: Only worked one year, opened the pool year two and it's leaking sand into the water. Will need to replace some laterals at least.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Shandor

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great filter, we had the exact same model before this one and it was 12 years old when we replaced it. Hayward makes great products as long as you take care of them. The only reason we had to replace the original one was we forgot to drain it and the water inside froze and cracked the plastic. So make sure you drain it every season and you wont have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Caddell

customer_reviews.title: works great, keeping my pool extra clean
customer_reviews.text: works great, keeping my pool extra clean, a huge improvement from the one that was purchased with the pool 8+ yrs ago, granted my old one lasted 8+yrs & is still operable, just alil small for a 24ft round above ground pool, we upgraded all equipment from 1hrs pwr to 1.5 what a huge difference in flow & filtering! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Nis

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice, but I haven’t put it into service yet
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice, but I haven’t put it into service yet. I’ll let you know in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Withrow

customer_reviews.title: So far it's perfect hooked it right up and works like it should ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the sand filter we've had since the early 80s. So far it's perfect hooked it right up and works like it should no issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had this brand once before and worked great for about 12 years
customer_reviews.text: Had this brand once before and worked great for about 12 years. This was a replacement and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, had an issue and they took care of it.
customer_reviews.text: Only two seasons out of it and it has a seam crack. Hayward sent me a new one. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: F. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong when purchasing this product...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect... Delivery was fast... Product was packaged well... easy to hook up... and the Price was amazing...
customer_reviews.author: Highlander series

customer_reviews.title: Hayward Filter 21 inch
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Intex Pool 9x18x52 The filter was horrible....that came with the pool. ...This Hayward Filter is Awesome it turns my water in the pool. .its great and thank you Amazon it also was delivered in about 3 to 5 days it came quickly...And all parts were with it including the base of the filter.. I also had this filter put in buy a POOL company....
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sand filter to replace a paper filter. It works so much better and is much cheaper. The paper filters can be cleaned but only 2-3 times before replacing. Cleaning this filter is just a matter of moving the dial on the filter and letting it backwash. You know when the pressure coming out of the pump is low it is time to backwash. I purchased sand from our local pool supply store and my teenage son and I installed it together.
customer_reviews.author: Ritzie

customer_reviews.title: Is what is says -- and works.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it by cutting out a failed older unit and reattaching it. I needed to use pipe unions, since the old plumbing was fixed in place. Easy to set up, easy to fill with sand, worked well through this past summer season.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Mikkelsen

customer_reviews.title: ... it for three months and seems to be working great.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for three months and seems to be working great.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great job filtering lake water
customer_reviews.text: Filter arrived as promised. Easy to put together - just make sure you snug down all the way on the multi port valve clamp bloting. I'm using the filter with my yard irrigation system which pulls water from the lake. This filter did the trick and I'm happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Hayward filter.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job keeps my pool sparkling clean. Before you backwash check your site glass mine was loose sprayed water everywhere until I tightened it up by hand not a big deal works fine after tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sams Pugs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Filter
customer_reviews.text: Never again will I use a “Cartridge” type filter. Sand is definitely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Dessa Kravitz

customer_reviews.title: Works so well, it is everything we needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works so well, it is everything we needed to keep our pool clean. I would definitely buy it again when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie&kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Use microfiber balls, better than sand
customer_reviews.text: The pool now looks like the pictures in a pool supply catalog.
customer_reviews.author: Punch

customer_reviews.title: Great filter.. make sure you use the right sand!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Make sure you purchase the CORRECT type of SAND... don't spend your money on HOMEDEPOT sand, as I have read that it can leak back into the pool... better to pay premium for pool store sand.. after, the sand will last 5-8 years so it is worth paying the extra $5 per bag...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F

customer_reviews.title: This filter is one of the best products we've used
customer_reviews.text: This filter is one of the best products we've used. It had our pool water clear overnight . Literally from green to crystal clear. This filter is definitely worth the purchase. Great seller and price is good.. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This filter met our needs. We are filtering an 18 foot round 52 inch deep pool. The only thing I find puzzling is a small leaking around the backwash display thing. Since this only happens during backwash, it doesn't effect the perfomance of the filter. It took a very cloudy pool (couldn't see bottom) and had it crystal clear in three days (running the filter about 8 hrs a day).
customer_reviews.author: John R Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to install did it all my self
customer_reviews.text: My pool is up and running pool is clear and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... up the pool instead of messing with the other crappy models.
customer_reviews.text: Should have got this the first time I set up the pool instead of messing with the other crappy models.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Trokey-Moudy

customer_reviews.title: Very fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I was suprised to see my order arrive so quickly. The water in my pool stayed clear. The filter was easy to install, but I would like to see a couple of 1 1/2" fittings that had a male thread on one end and a female thread in the other to make the installation easier still. It's doing a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn R. Teegarden

customer_reviews.title: My pool is back in business!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 12 year old tank that cracked (I hope this one lasts longer than the first one). Easy to put together and set up. Came with everything but sand!
customer_reviews.author: tacbear

customer_reviews.title: Hayward S210T Pro Series 21inch Top Mount Pool Filter
customer_reviews.text: This pool filter was easy to set up, fill with sand and works great. The Hayward descriptions suggests this filter is designed for above ground pools. We ordered and installed the S210T Pro Series 21 inch for our 16X32' in ground pool (approx 20,000gal). It is performing fine.
customer_reviews.author: Old Car

customer_reviews.title: Hayward S180T Pro Series
customer_reviews.text: The vender we bought this Sand filter from was great, delivery was qucik. Installation was easy and came with detailed instructions. My husband and I installed this for our above ground pool which is a 15,000 gal, without a problem. This filter is powerful does a great job cleaning our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hayward S210T Sand Filter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent filter and good price. All arrived on schedule and everything was included, No missing parts as some stated . I ordered my sand from ACE Hardware... I ran some PVC... turned the pump on... it cleaned my pool, what else can I say. Very happy so far with this Hayward S210T Sand Filter.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Major defect
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Hayward sand filter to bust at the seam. The first one lasted 4 years, this one lasted 4 months! Obviously a manufacturer defect.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've seen mixed reviews so I bought the warranty. It's a little smaller for a 27' pool, but it works very well and cleared it up fast. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace like filter that was about 13 years old. The other had some damage to the laterals and pressure gauge so I decided to replace the whole thing. This unit is great with everything included. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This sand filter dose a great job. The price was out standing. Its been working for close to month now with no issues. Its very easy to install. As all ways HAYWARD products have never let me down. They have been around a long time and easy to get parts for all products.
customer_reviews.author: kolby623

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! Keeps my above ground pool very clean without any problems. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is of good quality and was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Christy Rux

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Everything as included in the filter seller crossed all the T's. Very thoughtful not to short change the buyer. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Finally had to replace a 13 yr old Hayward Sand Filter that probably would've lasted longer if I wouldn't have left it unprotected last winter. Completely happy with easy install, shipment, and function. Would def recommend over lesser known brands that may be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hubans

product_meta.title: Hayward W3S166T ProSeries Sand Filter, 16-Inch, Top-Mount
product_meta.description: Size:16 Inch (W3S166T)Hayward’s ProSeries 16-Inch Top-Mount Sand Filter utilizes a precision-engineered umbrella-fold self-cleaning lateral system to provide efficient flow and evenly distributed water for totally balanced backwashing and long-lasting performance. For use in multiple applications—including above-ground/on-ground pools, small in-ground pools, aquariums (salt or fresh water) and ponds—ProSeries will provide clear, sparkling water for years to come.
feature_bullets: The Hayward ProSeries 16-Inch Above-Ground Pool Filter features durable corrosion-proof materials for dependable all-weather performance
Precision-engineered umbrella-fold self-cleaning lateral system provides efficient flow and evenly distributed water for totally balanced backwashing and long-lasting performance
7-position VariFlo valve provides maximum flow at lower pressure drop
Large pressure sand/water drain for rapid winterizing or servicing
Integral top diffuser ensures even distribution of water over the entire sand bed for maximum use of the filtration area

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars633 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
